name: A Loyal Crew
description:
The game is a variant of classic river crossing puzzles, themed after pirates. Get everyone across the river without running into any conflict

Instructions

Click on a person or an object to load it onto the boat, then click on the arrow to send the boat across the river. There must be at least one person on the boat to be able to send it across.

Each pirate has its own rules on how it can and cannot be left alone, so you'll have to be careful when you move people around.
